references.reason: This paper provides the technical report for GPT-4, a large language model used in UniPose for pose comprehension, generation, and editing.

references.paper_title: PoseScript: Linking 3d human poses and natural language
references.reason: This paper introduces the PoseScript dataset, which pairs human poses with detailed body part descriptions, serving as a crucial training dataset for the UniPose model.

references.paper_title: PoseFix: correcting 3d human poses with natural language
references.reason: This paper introduces the PoseFix dataset, which describes differences between pairs of 3D poses and provides a foundation for the pose editing aspect of the UniPose framework.
This paper introduces ChatPose, a method leveraging LLMs to generate 3D human poses, providing a basis for comparison and further development in the UniPose framework.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces CLIP, a model that learns transferable visual models from natural language supervision, which is used as a component of the visual processor within UniPose.
